company_description: Tripledot Studios is a mobile game development studio that creates casual and hyper-casual games for iOS and Android platforms.
founders: Akin Babayigit, Eyal Chameides, Lior Shiff
universities: Uni of Wisconsin/Yale/HBS, RMIT Uni, Tel-Aviv/GSB
